Articles.Content:
Well I'm living in China and quite new to the game(started from 0.20).

The farthest planet I've reached and returned to Kerbin from is Duna,and for only once.Now I'm mainly working on a Mun base for 10+ Kerbals to live in.

I'm really interested in exploring the Kerbol system,and I hope to have a great time here:D
Hello Acea. You'll find several of your countrymen on our forum.
Welcome to the ke- completely human forum!
